summary: FBI agent Brad joins Tony and Nick, the self styled Supermen who battle crime wearing bullet-proof super-suits. They are on a case involving radioactive counterfeit money and people who can be broken down into precious jewels.
cast: Tony Kendall|Brad Harris|Aldo Canti|Carlo Tamberlani|Rossella Bergamonti|Bettina Busch|Jochen Brockmann|Giuseppe Mattei|Valentino Macchi|Sergio Mioni|Enzo Maggio|Sal Borgese|Jeff Cameron|Gloria Paul|Jelena Zigon|Sabine Sun|Evi Rigano|Jochen Blume|Andr√© Bollet|Zori Gay|Friedrich Joloff|Helen Lynn|Bob Morel|Thomas Reiner
title: 3 Superhombres
